articles.name: CS 391
articles.imageDescription: A student taking the CS 391 course (1952 colorized)
articles.markdown:
In this class, students learn modern technologies and frameworks to develop Web apps. Main focus is on client side rendering with [Reactjs](https://reactjs.org/).
